item.title: hugo-xterm slides with reveal.js
item.description: Introduction Hugo theme for terminal users. Features Slides using reveal.js. Designed for blog and personal websites for professionals. Support for online CV and documentation.
item.content:
Introduction

  • Hugo theme for terminal users.

Features

  • Slides using reveal.js.
  • Designed for blog and personal websites for professionals.
  • Support for online CV and documentation.
